name: Share Shape
components: V, S, M (a piece of the creature whose form you plan to assume)
text: This spell functions as beast shape II, but you may only assume the form of an animal of a type identical to your animal companion or familiar. If your familiar or companion is not an animal, this spell has no effect.
target_zh: 你的动物伙伴、魔宠或者魔物仆从（fiendish servant）
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同护卫他人（shield other）一般，不过只能影响施法者的动物伙伴或魔宠。通常不会获得动物伙伴、魔宠或者魔物仆从（fiendish servant）的施法者，但是由替换职业能力、变体职业能力或者进阶职业获得上述生物的角色，并且能够施法的话，就能够将该法术作为1级法术施放。
